page.title: 06Nicola's family
page.content: In my family there is my dad,mum, sister,grandma.My dad,who has brown hair and eyes,drives coaches at G.&J. Holmes.My mum,who has brown hair and eyes,works at John Smedleys,a jumper and shirt factory .She is a personnel officer.My mum gets up at 7.20 each weekday. She usually gets to work at 8.26.My mum has her dinner break at 12.40.The other day she had a ham cob. My mum gets home about 5.00p.m.,makes herself some tea,sits down and watches the television.My grandma,who has grey hair and brown eyes,lives at our house.She does lots of housework.On Mondays my grandma does the ironing, Tuesdays she comes to Clay Cross, Wednesdays she cleans,Thursday collects her pension,Fridays she shops.My sister,Karen,is 14.She goes to Tupton Hall school.We often squabble but mostly we are friends.
